text: int main ( ) { int t , max , n ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int j , i , k , a [ n ] [ n ] , s [ n ] ; max = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) s [ i ] = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } if ( n % 2 != 0 ) { for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( i - j == k ) { s [ k ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } } for ( k = 0 ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( max < s [ k ] ) max = s [ k ] ; } } else { for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k < n / 2 ; k ++ ) { if ( ( i - j ) / 2 == k ) { s [ k ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } } for ( k = 0 ; k < n / 2 ; k ++ ) { if ( max < s [ k ] ) max = s [ k ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
